title: Greetings from the AUT LoL Club!
body:
Hello Summoners!

The Auckland University of Technology LoL Club will be one of the many universities participating in the Oceanic University Championships. Our club currently has over 250 members, if you are a student at AUT (or just want to be a part of the fun) feel free to [join our group.](https://www.facebook.com/groups/AUTLOL/?fref=ts) It's free!

We're hoping to have plenty of AUT students competing in this tournament, so start forming your teams! 

If you want to compete but don't have a team no worries! Use this thread to ask for and find team members, or alternatively, [fill out this form](http://goo.gl/forms/bw34qq9tSk) and the club will place you into a team as best fitting as possible. 

GL HF
